title: Gallery | Assembling for Anfield
body_text:
With both Christmas and a momentous Premier League fixture against Liverpool on the horizon, Mikel Arteta's squad had one final training session today.
Our first team put the finishing touches to their pre-Liverpool preparations at London Colney and our club photographers were on hand to capture the session.
Click through the gallery below:
